description.paragraphe1: We are passionate with informatics (techniques, tools, management, but also simply humans and their wellness at work) and we strive to constantly improve our practices, our behaviors and our mindset. In this world where everything is moving fast, we need key reference points for that, and thus we are looking for meaning and more human values at work, at home and in daily life.
description.paragraphe2: Let's imagine together a satisfied/satisfied business world where durable collaboration is the focus of attention. A business world where together, as a team, we develop know-how, interpersonal skills, and learning skills, while still taking better care of ourselves. For better economical, social and human outcomes.
description.paragraphe3: If you too you sometimes have this dream, then let's meet at Agile Grenoble on Thursday 19 November 2015. We'll share our dreams, our hopes, our ideas and our experiences on this long learning path of growing together!

agileinnovation.title: Agile Innovation 2015
agileinnovation.description: You want more ? Please join us at Agile Innovation 2015 on Friday November 20th (the day after Agile Grenoble). This day will run as an open space format conference in which you will bring and take all the topics that matter for you and for the other participants.

orateurs.title: Speakers
orateurs.description: The Agile Grenoble team is pleased to welcome you at the Word Trade Center on November 19, 2015 for a new day of exchanges around agility. Each year, about 50 speakers of France and other countries contributent to deliver a rich, diverse and high quality program.

keynotes.title: Keynotes
keynotes.description: In 2015 you'll discover several keynotes: conference opening, beginning of the afternoon and conference closing.

themes.title: Conference theme
themes.description: In 2015, the main theme of the conference is: Let's grow together!The sessions will be organized around the following lines:

cfp.title: Submitted Sessions
cfp.description: Our submission platform allows all potential speakers to view all submitted sessions, in order to exchange feedback and improve their content and/or description. You can change and adapt the description of your sessions at any time thanks to this platform until September 11th. An preselection will be done end of August.

register.title: Registrations
register.description: Registrations are now open. Do not wait for the very late moment to buy your ticket. For 8 years the tickets for our conference are sold out every year well in advance.

apropos.title: About
apropos.description: The conference Agile Grenoble exists since 2008 and the 2015 edition will be the 8th conference in a row. The event is wholly organized by the volunteers of the Club Agile Rhône-Alpes Grenoble, with of course the support of our sponsors and partners.

cara.title: Club Agile Rhône Alpes (CARA)
cara.description: The CARA is a non-profit association, striving to promote and disseminate agile methods in the Rhône-Alpes area to a large public, with various means: conference, seminars, meetings and partnerships.

programme.title: Program
programme.nondisponible: 2015 program is under finalization... stay tuned!
programme.disponible:
The conference program is now available!
You can already view this year sessions and their description.

inscriptions.title: Registrations
inscriptions.price: Registrations are mandatory. The price is 50 €. The ticket gives access to all conference sessions , as well as lunch and beverages served during breaks.
inscriptions.description: Registrations should be open around September 15th.

emails.title: Contacts
emails.description: To contact us before the conference, just send us an email:

orateur.desc: for the call for speakers and the session submissions

contact.desc: for any other question related to the conference
